:::Wheeljack:::

Wheeljack: What we'll do is you'll walk outside of the base, and take off in 
your pod until you get to the Maximal City.  Then we'll have to hope that the 
Maximal's come to your aid.

--part1_8c.c0982e1.28c3e1b9_boundary
